default:
As you’ve pressed End Secret, 
you suddenly got teleported to another level.
You just saw the title: Kaorfa’s Hideout.

And perhaps, this might only be just one of them.

Anda tidak dapat mempercayai tempat yang barusan Anda injakan. 
Dan mungkin, ini hanyalah salah satu dari sekian banyak.

default:
You’ve entered a bonus level!

Or if you can’t run, you can guess the teleporter down there.

Hideous Destructor guys keeps tiring.
This is what you get when you ask for realistic Doom.

Level ini, Anda hanya perlu lari lurus kedepan, & abaikan semua musuh.
Yang Anda perlu lakukan hanyalah segera lari ke EXIT & menekannya.

Atau apabila tidak bisa, Anda dapat menebak teleporter yang ada dibawah.

Remarks: EXIT TEXT

default:
You’ve collected alot of stuff Kaorfa had placed.
You are satisfied, exited the place, & come back to Hub.

You are very confused, whether this action justified or not,
Considering that all these were Kaorfa’s longsince artifacts.

Is this right, to take someone’s item who already passed away 
hundreds of years ago?
But it’s Joel’s! He is very kind! And these are just
Instances out of already defined by Perkedel, id, Fraggle, & many!
The rest of employees could just 3D print them again right?
Remarks:
After you end level on Kaorfa’s hideout

Don’t sad, okay you can. Idk if I could live that long anyway, if I did, will change that.
Yeah, if I still live by 2100s, I gotta change that.
id:
Anda telah mengoleksi banyak sekali barang yang Kaorfa tinggalkan.
Anda telah puas, meninggalkan tempat itu, & kembali ke Markas.

Anda menjadi sangat bingung, apakah tindakan ini dibenarkan atau tidak.
Mengingat barang2 ini adalah penginggalan artefak almarhum sejak lama.

Apakah boleh saya mengambil item seseorang yang telah almarhum
ratusan tahun yg lalu?
Tapi kan, ini milik Joel! Dia kan orangnya baik! Dan barang2 ini hanyalah
Instance2 yang telah didefinisikan oleh Perkedel, id, Fraggle, & kawan2!
Paling, karyawan yg masih hidup bisa aja 3D print ini ulang, ya kan?

default:
Folks, let’s not have a beef against.. Belko, for what he did against us.
Never you shall, in any centuries.
I know, License Checks (DRM). But still.
Just so you know, If I was in his shoes, I’d just FUTO (No DRM yadi yada) & use I am rich method instead,
So that those who can pay pay now, Can’t, Just let the peck go until they can, etc. Why So Hard?
Whatdya think?
Remarks:
Delta Touch is an Android Doom Source Port Collections that collects infamous Doom Source ports
Such as GZDoom, Zandronum, Vanilla Compatible & Limit removings.
Alas, this APK is Paid & as of certain version, it has a nasty DRM that if you sparsdated it, it causes License Error.
We no longer talking about certain descendants whose parent has oil refinery but cannot Credit Card any reason.
We’re now talking about Ownership.
However, as we scoured about this, we also found that Belko, as the developer of this collection was kind enough to give out vouchers to those who were unable to.
Of course, we are suspicious to those recipients upon hearing the news, as this could be abused.

For context, the App only costs USD 4.99 or about 50 Pts. (IDR 50 rb), 
However, there are nations with high living cost hence
see this as USD 4999 and counting

C’mon, do you really think those who lives there can even buy Chromebooks or pretty much just working cheap laptop just to GZDoom? I mean.. argh..
id:
Teman2, mari untuk tidak memiliki dendam terhadap.. Belko, atas apa yang telah ia perbuat terhadap kita.
Tidak sekalipun, abad kapanpun.
Ya tahu, Cek Lisensi (DRM). Tapi ya tetap saja.
Asal kalian tahu, kalau aku seandainya jadi dia, paling aku FUTO-in aja (Tanpa DRM dsb,) & pakai metode I am rich,
Jadi yang bisa bayar bayar sekarang, gk bisa ya gpp sampai bisa akhirnya, dsb. Susah Amat?
Gimana menurut kamu?

default:
Jesus Christ on an Innova!
I don’t pecking want to know anymore about that CEO shit. Nada!
Ever since we delved here, still just there a freaking toxicity in this political matter
UGH! Where the peck do we supposed to go again!? It’s been 200 Years!! and 1, idk. Lost count.
Remarks:
Graf Zahl, the main contributor upon GZDoom (a continued fork of Zdoom), is known to be very toxic over something e.g. does not designed for his GZDoom, etc.
Infamously, an incident occured when a Zdoom glitch test weren’t incompatible with the newer GZDoom. When Zahl should’ve been happy about this because it shows that those had fixed,
He instead went into meltdown mode, resulting him labeled as Salty Member. The label were shortly removed and changed again to something else.

Additionally, this message comes from Joel himself this 2025, where he stated his disappointment of this toxic situation in Doom community overall. He was also been a victim to this kind of toxicity,
Including the ban from his beloved community that forever changed his brain. He expected better, but always remembered, since he was betrayed, there is no more expecting.
And that’s the 200 years and 1. The date since his birth, to the day this was set in about 2100s
id:
Tuhan Yesus naik Kijang Innova!
Gw gk tau lagi soal CEO gitu lagi, gk akan!
Sejak kita masuk ini, masiiih aja toxicity dalam politik ini
EGH! Tau mau kemana lagi habis itu? Udah 200 tahun loh!! ama 1, tahu. Dah lupa.

default: Wait, you’re using Huawei? I hope the Aurora Store has implemented License Checks working..
Remarks:
Huawei as of sometimes ago was banned by USA Government & order every American to pull the plug against them, including Google
Hence, no more Google Play anymore.

If you buy Huawei now outside its origin (China), you maybe offered to install MicroG (open source alt Play Service) & Aurora Store (alt Google Play Store).
Of course, these combo are eternal development because Google is of course proprietary & often changes how their API works.

With this problem in mind, Delta Touch may not work in some cases, because they have DRM. 
APKs that do License Checks will use the API that taps into Google Play Store APK then validate your purchases.
id: Bentar, lu pakai Huawei kan? Duh semoga Aurora Store udah bisa License Check nih..

default:
Pls, don’t go to VRChat, ChilloutVR, or any meetup social media of that matter!
Without POC License enforcement, it’s havoc! Worse than Hell, Hollows, & Invasion combined!
It’s no longer just about being Blocked, you know..
Remarks:
Social media in general without government level / Radio-like of moderation is dangerous, Joel stated circa 2024
Fun fact, as Arenod Sediron, Dasandim, & friends passed this law, it of course causes backlash. And of course, they don’t turn back.
& turns out, the community becomes Ordered once again.
Additionally, Arenod Sediron advised against registering or even engaging to any social media that does not ask your POC License.

POC stands for PTT (Push to talk) over Celular, a type of Radiocomms where the radio goes over internet instead of conventional radio frequencies.
Basically Discord with Push to Talk option.

When Joel was been attacked numerous times, including the final blow that changed his brain, he established the idea where the social media are moderated
Just like Frequency Radio.
Where in Frequency Radio, License required in order to ensure use of wave done in manners & no disturbances.
Here, with Internet Comms, License shall be required in order not only to ensure rooms done in manners & no disturbances, 
But also behaviours, equivalent to Driving License where it has tickets & confiscation.
id:
Pls, jangan pergi ke VRChat, ChilloutVR, atau medsos bertemu apapun!
Tanpa penegakan Lisensi POC, kacau dah! Lebih parah dari Neraka, Hollow, & Invasi bersamaan!
Ini bukan lagi soal Diblokir loh..

default: Never ever communicate with realm that does not enforce POC License
Remarks:
POC License moderates your communication just like usual with classic Radiocomms, for Social Medias.
Some people consider this enforcement a dictatorist due to its Radio-like strict rules.
It was established thanks to Sediron massacre 2030. Dasandim parliament initially established somekind of moderation bill, but shortly then
Handed over to Arenod Sediron, & then DNB as a whole.
Social Media or Special Platform that enforces this POC license results in a pipedream-like peaceful communication assuming the admins are good.
Very contrast to regular Social Media that liberates almost everything 
(including Blocking, where POC License stress its rules & punishment for abuse).
id: Jangan pernah berkomunikasi di tempat tanpa penegakan Lisensi POC

default:
Did you know, Joel is a human?
Yeah, the Protogen was just a costume,
After reforming the Protogen world
Remarks:
Despite Joel being a Furry, he is not a thyren in actuallity both IRL & Perkedel Cinematic Universe.
The Protogen Reform comes from Surreal Blender Meme X Protogen fangame.

Years after the Homestuck squad laid off as in the 2030 Harrasser Arrester Shutdown, they were bored doing their regular jobs.
At night, when sleeping, suddenly they were lifted up like heaven, into Surreal Blender Meme realm. New commission to go to Protogen sub-realm.
At first, these Protogens are happy, but behind it all, the queen (called just Queen) that leads is all is evil. 
Outcast & callback the outcast, the Homestuck & friends defeated the Queen & took over the Protogen world.
Liberated every single single gotchas in her licensing of the patent (same with IRL’s Protogen & Primagen patents)
& Freed the thyrens from being experimented on.
id:
Tahukah Anda bahwa Joel itu manusia?
Ya, Protogen itu hanyalah kostum,
Bekas reformasi Dunia Protogen.
